name: Empire
title: Disrupt The Energy
text:
Synopsis
The energy sector is emerging as a promising frontier for decentralized infrastructure (DePIN) in crypto, with potential for significant disruption in how energy is sourced, traded, and managed through blockchain technologies.

Key Insights
- Tech giants are experiencing massive energy demands due to the AI arms race, leading to grid access challenges
- Framework Ventures is focusing on energy as a non-consensus crypto investment opportunity
- DePIN (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks) is showing potential in energy markets, particularly in addressing supply and demand networks
- Crypto energy startups like Glow and Daylight are working on decentralizing green energy through blockchain rewards
- Historical precedents like Powerledger demonstrate both the potential and challenges of peer-to-peer energy trading in crypto
- Framework Ventures predicts DePIN could become to energy what DeFi has become to financial services
